attributes.action: Save the cheque from abolition in 2018.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banking industry, represented by the Payments Council, has voted to abolish the cheque in 2018.  We call on the government to pass legislation to save the cheque and prevent its abolition.

Currently no realistic alternative exists to make payments between individuals and to small businesses, particularly where individuals do not have access to internet banking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
